                          netgest.bo.xwc.components.classic.GridPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.faces.component.EditableValueHolder, javax.faces.component.StateHolder, javax.faces.component.ValueHolder, netgest.bo.xwc.components.security.SecurableComponent, netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIEditableValueHolder
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bridge, GridExplorer, List
public class GridPanel
extends ViewerInputSecurityBase

A GridPanel is a XVW component that's used to display (in a tabular form) a list of items (provided by a data source). It provides built-in mechanisms to sort, group the data, etc. The items in a GridPanel are paginated by default (50 items per page) Items in the table can be selected and clicked which can in turn trigger specific actions (such as opening a new window when double clicking a given row in the table)

Author:
jcarreira

rowSelectionMode

public netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIViewStateBindProperty<java.lang.String> rowSelectionMode
Determines how a user can select the rows in the grid panel. Default (ROW) allows the user to select a single row; (MULTI_ROW) allows the user to select multiple row and CELL disables row selection. Users select multiple lines with the Ctrl button

serverActionWaitMode

public netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIBindProperty<java.lang.String> serverActionWaitMode

enableHeaderMenu

private netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIViewBindProperty<java.lang.Boolean> enableHeaderMenu
Defines whether or not the header menu appears in the GridPanel. The Header Menu is situated on the top part of the GridPanel and it displays the title of the panel.

currentSortTerms

private netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIViewProperty<java.lang.String> currentSortTerms
The current sort parameters, is used with a string in the form 'NAME_OF_COLUM|ORDER'. To order by the 'name' column in ascending order the value would be 'name|ASC' in descending order would be 'name|DESC'

onRowDoubleClick

private netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIMethodBindProperty onRowDoubleClick
Defines the method that's invoked when a row of the GridPanel is doubled clicked. If the property is used with value "" (empty value) the row double click event is disabled

onRowClick
